variable_description: Month in which report observations are collected
notes: Dates are recorded in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD

variable_description: type of egg product: hatching, table eggs
type of production process and housing: cage-free (organic), cage-free (non-organic), all
notes: The value 'all' includes cage-free and conventional housing.

variable_description: number of eggs produced by hens for a given month-type-process combo
number of hens producing eggs for a given month-type-process combo
Original USDA report from which data are sourced
notes: Values correspond to titles of PDF reports in /raw repository. Date of report is included in title.

variable_description: observed or computed percentage of cage-free hens relative to all table-egg-laying hens
computed percentage of cage-free eggs relative to all table eggs
notes: This variable is not available for data sourced from the Egg Markets Overview report
